entry.title: A Taproot-native (re-)bindable transaction bundle proposal
entry.summary: The observation regarding Unspent Transaction Outputs (UTXOs) highlights a significant trend in the Bitcoin network, specifically post-taproot activation. A vast majority, 86%, of UTXOs account for less than 1000 satoshis, indicating that the anticipated use cases by protocol developers have not seen widespread adoption as expected. This statistic serves as a critical insight into the current state and challenges within Bitcoin's development landscape, suggesting that despite technological advancements, broader acceptance and implementation lag behind initial projections. This data point was shared within the context of discussions among members of the "Bitcoin Development Mailing List", a group dedicated to conversations around Bitcoin's technical evolution.
